content: Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the darkened caves of The Webbed Hollow, where insect guai run rampant under the control of a mysterious lady that holds one of the Great Sage's Senses that the Destined One seeks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4-Rosy_Cheeks,_Gray_Hair.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Walkthrough Sections'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the darkened caves of The Webbed Hollow, where insect guai run rampant under the control of a mysterious lady that holds one of the Great Sage's Senses that the Destined One seeks.
